ax.description: Ax Function is for creating dynamic web content.

ax-appkit.description: Axf Core is an Ax extension that provides a router, http utility, form builder and report builder.

ax-appkit-dropdown.description: An Ax extension for dropdown menus and popups.

ax-appkit-field.description: An Ax extension that adds a field control to the ax-appkit-kit form builder and report builder.

ax-appkit-field-dependent.description: An Ax extension that makes field control visibility dependent upon values in other fields.

ax-appkit-field-extras.description: An Ax extension that adds some extra controls, including country, language, timezone, password.

ax-appkit-field-nest.description: An Ax extension that allows fields to be nested.

ax-appkit-field-nest-prefab.description: An Ax extension with some pre-built field controls for easy nesting, such as table, many, one.

ax-appkit-form-async.description: An Ax extension that makes ax-appkit-kit forms submit asynchronously.

ax-appkit-indexer.description: An Ax extension for indexing lists with filering and pagination.

ax-appkit-panes.description: An Ax extension for splitting viewport into vertical or horizontal panes.

ax-appkit-twitter-bootstrap4.description: An Ax extension that adds bootstrap styling classes to the ax-appkit-kit form builder and report builder.
